name: TERA: PUBG Weekend Warrior Pack
detailed_description:
True. Action. Combat! meets the the thrills and gear of Player Unknown's Battlegrounds! Jump into the TERA × PUBG crossover event with all the high-speed gear to get a chicken dinner of your own!

    This pack contains:
  • PUBG Weekend Warrior Costume
  • PUBG Pan Accessory
  • Chicken Dinner Cheeks Pet
  • You can also dodge bullets with the Ricochet Racer Footsteps Accessory

The items contained in this pack can be claimed and used by only one TERA character per account.
about_the_game:
True. Action. Combat! meets the the thrills and gear of Player Unknown's Battlegrounds! Jump into the TERA × PUBG crossover event with all the high-speed gear to get a chicken dinner of your own!

    This pack contains:
  • PUBG Weekend Warrior Costume
  • PUBG Pan Accessory
  • Chicken Dinner Cheeks Pet
  • You can also dodge bullets with the Ricochet Racer Footsteps Accessory

The items contained in this pack can be claimed and used by only one TERA character per account.
short_description: TERA × PUBG crossover event! This pack contains a PUBG Weekend Warrior costume, the PUBG Pan accessory, a Chicken Dinner Cheeks pet, and the Ricochet Racer footseps accessory! Grab your gear now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP (32-bit only), Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: AMD Athlon64 3200+ or INTEL Pentium 4 3.2ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1600T or nVidia GeForce 7600GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 (Latest Service Packs)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon64 X2 6000+ or INTEL Core 2 Duo E6750
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3870 or nVidia GeForce 8800GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
